name: Commencement of business
description: Invested shareholders must confirm payment and office address
penalty: 50,000 for the company

name: Auditor Appointment
description: Company informs new auditor and submits ADT form to ROC
penalty: 300 per month

name: DIN eKYC
description: Directors share personal information for identification & verification
penalty: 5000 one time

name: DPT-3
description: Companies report money taken from people to ROC; auditors confirm details.
penalty: 300 per month

name: MCA Form AOC-4
description: It's like an official report card for a company's documents.
penalty: 200 per day

name: MCA Form MGT-7
description: Companies must annually report activities and finances to the registrar
penalty: 200 per day

name: GST Filing
description: Filing Goods and Services Tax (GST) returns on a monthly or quarterly basis.
penalty: Varies based on tax amount and delay

name: ITR Filing
description: Submission of Income Tax Return (ITR) for individuals and businesses.
dueDate: 31st July for individuals, 30th September for businesses
penalty: Varies based on income and delay

name: Trademark Renewal
description: Renewal of trademark registration to maintain protection.
penalty: Loss of trademark protection

name: Annual General Meeting
description: Annual gathering of company shareholders and directors to discuss company affairs.
dueDate: Within 6 months from the end of the financial year
penalty: Legal consequences for non-compliance

name: ESI and PF Payment
description: Monthly payment of Employee State Insurance (ESI) and Provident Fund (PF) contributions.
penalty: Interest and legal actions for delays

name: Import/Export Declarations
description: Submission of customs declarations for imports and exports.
penalty: Fines and customs delays for non-compliance

name: Safety Compliance Audit
description: Regular safety audits to ensure workplace safety and compliance with regulations.
dueDate: Annually or as required by authorities
penalty: Fines and possible business closure

name: Environmental Impact Assessment
description: Assessment of environmental impact for new projects and activities.
penalty: Project delays and fines for non-compliance

name: FDA Drug Approval
description: Approval process for pharmaceutical companies to market new drugs.
dueDate: Varies based on drug development timeline
penalty: Delays in product launch and financial losses

name: Building Permit Renewal
description: Renewal of permits for construction and building projects.
dueDate: Annually or as specified by local authorities
penalty: Construction delays and fines for non-renewal

name: Fire Safety Inspection
description: Regular inspections to ensure fire safety in commercial and residential properties.
dueDate: Annually or as required by fire department
penalty: Fire hazards and potential legal actions

name: Export Control Compliance
description: Compliance with export control regulations for sensitive goods and technologies.
penalty: Legal consequences for export violations

name: Labor Union Reporting
description: Submission of labor union activity and financial reports as required by law.
dueDate: Annually or as required by labor laws
penalty: Legal actions for non-compliance

name: FDA Food Labeling Compliance
description: Compliance with FDA regulations for food product labeling.
penalty: Recalls and legal actions for non-compliance

name: Whistleblower Protection Policy
description: Implementation and maintenance of policies to protect whistleblowers in the workplace.
penalty: Legal consequences for retaliation against whistleblowers

name: Data Protection Compliance
description: Compliance with data protection and privacy laws, including GDPR and CCPA.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for data breaches

name: FDA Clinical Trials Approval
description: Approval process for conducting clinical trials of new medical treatments.
penalty: Delays in research and financial losses

name: Ethical Sourcing Audit
description: Regular audits to ensure ethical sourcing of materials and labor in supply chains.
dueDate: Annually or as required by corporate policies
penalty: Reputational damage and legal actions for non-compliance

name: Customs Duty Payment
description: Payment of customs duties on imported goods
penalty: Varies based on duty amount and delay

name: Property Tax Payment
description: Payment of property taxes to local authorities
dueDate: Annually or as per local tax calendar
penalty: Varies based on property value and delay

name: Capital Gains Tax Reporting
description: Reporting capital gains on investments or property sales
dueDate: Annually or upon sale of assets
penalty: Varies based on capital gains and delay

name: Excise Tax Filing
description: Filing excise taxes for specific products or services
penalty: Varies based on tax amount and delay

name: Corporate Tax Payment
description: Payment of corporate income taxes to government authorities
penalty: Varies based on income and delay

name: EEO-1 Reporting
description: Annual submission of Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) data to the government.
penalty: Penalties vary based on non-compliance

name: Hazardous Waste Disposal
description: Proper disposal of hazardous waste materials in compliance with environmental regulations.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for improper disposal

name: Annual Report to Shareholders
description: An annual report to shareholders on the company's performance and financial status.
dueDate: Within 90 days after the fiscal year-end
penalty: Legal consequences for non-compliance

name: Tax Audit Response
description: Preparation and submission of documentation during a tax audit by tax authorities.
penalty: Penalties vary based on audit findings

name: Pharmaceutical Regulatory Compliance
description: Compliance with regulatory requirements for pharmaceutical companies.
penalty: Fines and product recalls for non-compliance

name: ISO Certification Renewal
description: Renewal of ISO certification for quality management and compliance.
penalty: Loss of ISO certification and potential business implications
upperLimit: Depends on ISO certification body rules

name: Export Documentation
description: Preparation of export documentation including invoices, bills of lading, and certificates of origin.
penalty: Delays in exports and potential fines for non-compliance

name: Food Safety Inspection
description: Regular inspections to ensure food safety and hygiene standards are met.
dueDate: Annually or as required by health authorities
penalty: Fines and product recalls for non-compliance

name: Antitrust Compliance Training
description: Mandatory antitrust compliance training for employees to prevent antitrust violations.
penalty: Legal consequences for antitrust violations

name: FDA Quality System Regulation
description: Compliance with FDA quality system regulations for medical devices.
penalty: Fines and product recalls for non-compliance

name: OSHA Safety Reporting
description: Reporting workplace accidents and illnesses to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).
penalty: Fines and potential legal actions for non-compliance

name: Intellectual Property Renewals
description: Renewal of patents, trademarks, and copyrights to maintain IP protection.
penalty: Loss of IP protection and potential financial losses
upperLimit: Depends on intellectual property office rules

name: Financial Statement Audits
description: Annual financial statement audits to ensure accuracy and compliance.
dueDate: Annually or as required by regulatory bodies
penalty: Fines and legal consequences for financial misstatements

name: FCC Spectrum Auction Participation
description: Participation in FCC spectrum auctions for telecommunications companies.
penalty: Exclusion from auctions and potential market disadvantages

name: Environmental Impact Reporting
description: Regular reporting of environmental impact and sustainability initiatives.
dueDate: Annually or as required by environmental agencies
penalty: Fines and reputational damage for non-compliance

name: HIPAA Compliance
description: Ensuring compliance with Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) regulations for healthcare organizations.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for data breaches and non-compliance

name: SEC Filings
description: Submission of financial reports and disclosures to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
penalty: Fines and legal actions for reporting violations

name: Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) Compliance
description: Compliance with FLSA regulations regarding minimum wage, overtime, and child labor standards.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for labor law violations

name: Chemical Safety Data Reporting
description: Submission of chemical safety data to regulatory authorities under REACH, GHS, or local regulations.
penalty: Fines and product restrictions for non-compliance

name: Accessibility Compliance
description: Ensuring digital and physical accessibility for individuals with disabilities, in compliance with ADA and other laws.
penalty: Legal actions and loss of business for accessibility violations

name: Consumer Data Privacy Compliance
description: Compliance with data privacy regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and other regional laws.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for data privacy violations

name: Hazardous Materials Transportation
description: Compliance with regulations for the transportation of hazardous materials by road, air, or sea.
penalty: Fines and restrictions for non-compliance

name: Aviation Safety Inspections
description: Regular safety inspections and audits for aviation companies and airports.
penalty: Fines and operational restrictions for safety violations

name: Medical Device Registration
description: Registration of medical devices with regulatory agencies for market authorization.
dueDate: Before marketing or as per regulatory schedule
penalty: Product recalls and legal actions for unregistered devices

name: Nuclear Safety Compliance
description: Compliance with nuclear safety regulations and inspections for nuclear facilities.
dueDate: As required by nuclear safety authorities
penalty: Fines, shutdowns, and legal actions for nuclear safety violations

name: Financial Crime Compliance
description: Ensuring compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) and anti-corruption regulations.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for financial crime violations

name: Air Emissions Reporting
description: Reporting of air emissions and pollutants in compliance with environmental regulations.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for air emissions violations

name: International Trade Sanctions
description: Compliance with international trade sanctions and embargo regulations.
dueDate: Ongoing vigilance and trade sanctions updates
penalty: Fines and legal actions for trade sanctions violations

name: Cybersecurity Compliance
description: Compliance with cybersecurity regulations and data protection laws to protect against cyber threats.
penalty: Fines and legal actions for data breaches and cybersecurity violations

name: Human Resources Compliance
description: Compliance with labor laws and regulations regarding employee rights, wages, and working conditions.
dueDate: Ongoing vigilance and updates to labor laws
penalty: Fines and legal actions for labor law violations

name: Telecommunications Licensing
description: Obtaining and maintaining licenses for telecommunications services and infrastructure.
penalty: Loss of license and legal actions for unlicensed operations
